```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

```{r}

# Create a vector

vec_a <- c(4,5)

vec_b <- c(-3,10)

```

## Vector addition

```{r}

# Create a new vector vec_c that is the sum of vec_a and vec_b

vec_c <- vec_a + vec_b

```

## Vector subtraction


```{r}

vec_d <- vec_b - vec_a

```

## Vector scalar multiplier:

```{r}

vec_e <- 4 * vec_b

```

## vector dot product:

```{r}

vec_a %*% vec_b

```
